Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy

Class CheaterPlayerStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.Strategy
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.CheaterPlayerStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CheaterPlayerStrategy extends Strategy implements Serializable
Class that implements the Cheater Player Strategy This class extends the parent Strategy class which has createOrder method to be implemented here.
